SeriesDescription: Proportion of countries with systems to track and make public allocations for gender equality and women's empowerment (%)
Source: Data are derived from country reporting on 13 binary questions on questionnaire, collected through the Global Partneship for Effective Development Cooperation
FootNote: The numerical value 1 represents "Approaches requirement", 0 for "Does not meet requirement" and 2 for "Fully meets requirement".
